website_summaries.verdict: Customers seeking highly rated dog rain boots will find their match in this reliable product.
pros: Sole is anti-slip for dog's security
Adjustable Velcro straps are reflective for night safety
Expandable design makes boots easy to put on and take off
cons: Not the best fit for dogs with thinner legs

customer_reviews.title: Hank loves his new kicks!
customer_reviews.text: Hank loves his shoes! I needed something to help him walk on our hardwoods. He's almost 13 w arthritis. We've tried everything. I wish I got these a long time ago. He's a very good boy.. the instructions are great. With treats and encouragement, he was using them with ease within about 10 minutes. They fit great and have 2 Velcro straps. The top strap ensures they don't fall off if you put them on snug. His sister tried to pull 2 off by giving a good tug, but they stayed on. Now the old man can walk with confidence and I don't have to have towels or rugs everywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Susan S.

customer_reviews.title: Great for Older Dogs with Arthritis
customer_reviews.text: Great for dogs with arthritis. My 15 year old dog is wearing the boots on his back legs for traction. His back legs are just not strong enough and he struggles on slick floors. In the few hours that he has been wearing them.....he is walking everywhere. He has walked more in a few hours than he has in months. He doesnt struggle to get up or stand on the floors.
customer_reviews.author: Jaclyn Yetmar

customer_reviews.title: Works great with another product!
customer_reviews.text: I like using these boots to protect my little girl’s paws during winter days. However, she’s a bit moody and not always let me put them on. I think she’s not always comfortable wearing them. When this happens, I use Paw Shield by PetSupply. This paw balm does a very good job when it comes to paw protection and also moisturizes and heals dry paw pads. Here is the link to Paw Shield:  Highly recommend using both products at the same time!
customer_reviews.author: Tara

customer_reviews.title: These boots are grrreat !!!
customer_reviews.text: ...it took.my Lab a few times to get used to them (shook his foot like a cat with a piece of tape stuck to its paw, if ya know what I mean, lol)..it was actually kinda hilarious to watch him walk and try to hold his paws up like he had stilts on...lol....but now he knows when I get them out, that we're going for a walk or a bike ride, and he loves those adventures...so no prob ! ...(no more cut paws, and or hot pavement)...cant wait for winter to watch him play in the snow...no more cold toes for my boy..Ha!
customer_reviews.author: pdxWildChild

customer_reviews.title: Great product for a great price!
customer_reviews.text: We bought these for our 95 pound bully pit. We walk in the Mesa where he picks up cactus stickers. These seem to work pretty well! Some of the cactus get through, but it's way better than nothing! I wish they were a little longer to protect his legs, but again, better than not having anything. I would recommend them for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Renata Kae Welch

customer_reviews.title: Older dog
customer_reviews.text: I bought these because my older German shepherd was having trouble walking inside on the hardwood. He loves these and walks around with ease now! ( I only put them on his back paws for extra support )
customer_reviews.author: Yoder

customer_reviews.title: Poor construction
customer_reviews.text: These shoes fit my girl well, however the buckle came unsewn on one side within a week of purchase. Granted my dog has degenerative myelopathy so the boot gets dragged a lot but I would think they would be durable enough to stand up to that. Unfortunately, this is like my third purchase of a different brand of boots and have been unable to fine one durable enough. I wish a veterinarian would invent a boot specifically for this disorder.
customer_reviews.author: Terri Carpenter

customer_reviews.title: Maggie loves her new shoes!
customer_reviews.text: My 80lb Goldendoodle Maggie loves her new shoes! We bought them for a trip to the beach, but she wears them on most of her walks at home now if we get a late start (we live in AZ). She got used to them in just an hour or so! They fit great and stay on.
customer_reviews.author: Janess P.

customer_reviews.title: Used, smelly merchandise
customer_reviews.text: I was very excited to receiving these boots, but when I finally got them they were nothing like I had expected. They were delivered used, with lots of dog hair, and they had a horrid smell. Nothing in the description mentioned they were used.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: At such an affordable price these shoes are awesome! My border collie loves them and had NO ...
customer_reviews.text: At such an affordable price these shoes are awesome! My border collie loves them and had NO PROBLEM with me putting them on. I got two sets of four shoes: size 5 for the back (smaller) paws and one size 6 for the front paws. This totals eight shoes but front paws are slightly larger than the back. This way I'll have a back up set for him if the others ever wear out. They fit great, and DON'T come off when we play raquetball or basketball together. THANK YOU QUMY!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stupid pieces of JUNK, do not buy!
customer_reviews.text: I looked for a week for good dog boots that will stay on and after reading the reviews had high hopes for these. Well, stupidly, I did not try them before the return date and now I'm stuck with boots that fling off within 10 steps. I am so bummed that I cannot get my money back for these. DO NOT BUY. Find something else that goes higher on the leg. They are going in the trash as I wouldn't want to curse anyone else with these crappy boots.
customer_reviews.author: Julia G Johanan

customer_reviews.title: Great dog boots!!!
customer_reviews.text: We are so pleased with these boots!!! They stay on!!! They do a good job at protecting our dogs feet, and they seem comfortable. Our dog has been galloping through the snow and ice and they hold up. Very happy with our purchase!
customer_reviews.author: DF

customer_reviews.title: Fell apart in less than 2 months
customer_reviews.text: I loved these boots and have used then for our elderly dog who goes on a short, slow walk daily. The strap broke in less than 2 months of very very light use.
customer_reviews.author: TXmom

customer_reviews.title: The fit was perfect! My American bully just adjusted right away and ...
customer_reviews.text: The fit was perfect! My American bully just adjusted right away and it was like she has always worn them... she can now run with our other dogs through the pokey weedsand she is so fast in them... she does sound like a horse. The only thing I would suggest is better ventilation, her feet feel sweaty after...
customer_reviews.author: Lana Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable for older dogs!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these boots mainly because we have hardwood floors that our older dog is having difficulty walking on. At first I was a little anxious as she had gone through many shoes in the past and always ended up ripping them off with clear disdain on her face. After fitting these shoes on her followed by many praises and treats, however, she has finally gotten used to them! These appear more comfortable than previous brands I've tried and my dog can now walk on our floors without slipping and hurting herself and our floors. I would definitely recommend this product for anyone. For reference, my dog is an 80 lb Golden Retriever and I purchased a size 6.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Not for small breeds
customer_reviews.text: I bought a ruler to measure my 10 lb Shih Tzu’s feet and determined he was a size 2. The shoes were really loose and his paws kept slipping out so I pulled the Velcro as tight as possible. While that did help, the length of the shoe was still too long despite his measurements indicating they should fit. The description should be updated to say they are only for large dogs. I would not recommend for little breeds! Furthermore, I can also attest to the low quality fabric others have mentioned. My dog hasn’t even worn them outside the house and the glue that holds the shoe together is already coming off. For $30, I expected better.
customer_reviews.author: mipsy

customer_reviews.title: surprised how much she loves them
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to get these for my golden retriever. She used to avoid gravel paths or would choose to walk on them, but with her boots on she runs full speed on gravel and carries a look of enjoyment while bombing through park trails. She doesn't have as many issues with her paws when I put these on her for long walks. It didn't take her that long to get used to them, and she learned pretty quickly that these boots meant she was going to the park. She's about 70-75lbs, and size 6 works for her paws, her front paws are a little bigger and can fit with size 7 but size 6 works good!
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Very Helpful!
customer_reviews.text: These booties are great! 2 velcros allow for a firm grim. We took my dog to the beach, stayed on through swimming and sinking into the sand. The boot has a very firm hard plastic with grips which is freat for protecting the paws. Please Note: We bought these for my dog because she got a tumor removed and they had to cut the nerve in her leg. The boot is to stop her from cutting up her foot if she drags it while walking on pavement etc.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Amazing! But consider getting socks too.
customer_reviews.text: These were AMZAZING for our hiking trips. Our golden accidentally ripped his paws and he couldn’t walk for days. So we bought these, and they are so nice! He doesn’t even notice When they’re on. He slipped a lot on rocks but I’m not sure it was because of the boots themselves. Sometimes they twist when we first put them on and he walks around but then we just tighten them a little and they’re fine for the entire hike. I would suggest getting socks. The back ones rubbed his fur off and he’s got a nice scab growing there. Just got some socks for them so hopefully that’ll help.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Walker

customer_reviews.title: These boots stay on
customer_reviews.text: I bought them for our lab who kept slipping on our laminate floors. While she still high steps when I first put them on, she is wearing them longer each time. I was sure she'd get them off right away, but the straps have held so far. My husband is really looking forward to her wearing them in the Winter as her feet bother her in the snow. Now, I know we won't have to be concerned about them coming off in the snow. I am very satisfied and would recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: S. Licht

customer_reviews.title: We treat him like our child
customer_reviews.text: We treat him like our child! These were great. From the cement to the beach! They were excellent and hold up well. He had no problems walking in them! Great product & well made!
customer_reviews.author: RECRJW

customer_reviews.title: Certainly keep her feet warmer
customer_reviews.text: Sassy loves to be outside but when her paws get cold she wants to come in. These boots seem to be working just fine and she spends more time running around in the snow. The only problem I have encountered is her dew claws. The Velcro strips are directly over her dew claws and seem to cause her some discomfort. I have tried padding them before putting on the boot and that seems to have helped. Would be nice if there was more soft padding in that area since you have to pull the Velcro rather tight to keep the boots on.
customer_reviews.author: CAdele

customer_reviews.title: Won't stay on
customer_reviews.text: I was reluctant to buy these because I doubted their ability to stay on the dog's feet, but I read a bunch of reviews saying how well they stayed on because of the great straps so I took a chance. Well, I should have listened to my instinct and ignored those reviews, because I have yet to send my dog out with these on and have her com back with all four still in place. I spend more time out looking for lost boots than I would just washing her feet!! I see this as a waste of $35. Very disappointed. Be warned,
customer_reviews.author: Troy H.

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes! Training instructions
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes! Training instructions!! My dog adapted very well, she will have her feet protected from hot pavement.
customer_reviews.author: Anne Hamel

customer_reviews.title: A good buy!
customer_reviews.text: Water proof not so much! The first thing my Boxer did was trip on the first step of our pool, and they were soaked. Had to let them dry out for half a day. Fit-up is better than most I've tried. The wide opening makes it easy to put on. The double straps help to keep them on. But... they still come off after walking for a while. My Boxer is a service Dog, and we are currently on vacation in Blythe, CA. 116 degree days makes the assault over 185 degrees. Her shoes absolutely kept her feet from burning. I would buy these again, but I wish there was a better way to keep them on all the time.
customer_reviews.author: del92126

customer_reviews.title: Fits a BIG Old English Sheepdog!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to get on, easy for sheepie to walk in early days but looks sturdy and durable. In the south we don’t get much snow but lots of stickers and things to cut paws- which has been problematic for us so we are excited this maybe the perfect solution! So ray even hubby can get on in record time! Also no slipping for the old girl on our ceramic tile floors!!! Perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Jan

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT LEAVE ON DOG TOO LONG
customer_reviews.text: If you are buying these because you dog is slipping around the house, please do not leave them on too long or too put them on too tight. Our dog has mild hip dysplasia so we bought these and another brand. I liked these because there are two straps to keep the boots on and in place. When I took them off my dog after a week, he had a stage 1 pressure ulcer. It was my mistake not to change them daily, but I don't want someone to make the same mistake.
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Thin crap. They're a knock off of the petacc ones, which are the same price.
customer_reviews.author: S

customer_reviews.title: Sizing can be tricky
customer_reviews.text: This product looks really well made, it's thick soles and strong velcro are will made. I had to return mine due to measurements. I measured his paws like it shows on the page, however the size 6 that fit the measurements were huge! Id say a6 is more for a lab or larger pawed dog. My beagle measured 2.5"wide but the size did not fit at all. If you get your sizing right im site it's a great product, though it's very thick material is more about durable than flexible I think.
customer_reviews.author: S. Scheck

customer_reviews.title: My dog said no
customer_reviews.text: We bought these for our husky. We were going to Yosemite and thought it might be good to try and protect his feet. First of all, he wouldn't let us put them on. After many attempts we finally got them on him. They fit his feet, but were kind of awkward. The second he took off running, they flew off. And we had them tight enough, but not too tight. We bought size 6 based on reviews. I don't know what happened. Mostly he didn't like them and I didn't want to keep them and never use them. I'm sure they take getting used to, but I opted to return them. They seem good quality though.
customer_reviews.author: KatyLeigh

customer_reviews.title: The best buy ever!
customer_reviews.text: I bought 4 sets hoping that I could get my dogs to walk with these. Amazingly, all my dogs love wearing them. Its seems like everytime we put them on they get more pep in their step. They fit perfectly. I have 3 pit mixes and a husky pit mix and bought size Large for all 4 and I've had no issues. We use them going on a walk and also when we go to the lake. They are easy to put on. Washing machine friendly, we dont put them in the dryer. We live in Arizona and when its 119 they are a life saver on their feet. On the road, pavement, terrain, or water they work everywhere.
customer_reviews.author: stacey bacchi

customer_reviews.title: We can hike in the heat!!!
customer_reviews.text: I live in Nevada and the temperature gets extremely hot in the summer. The pavement gets way too hot and would burn a dog's paws. My family and I love to go hiking in the hot weather and we want to take our dog. We went on a long hike today and my dog Riley was able to walk the 3 hour hike with us with no issues. I'm so extremely happy I bought these for him. He's comfortable in them and seems to understand their purpose. They stayed on, he even jumped some rocks and they didn't fall off. It didn't take him long to get used to them, just a day. This is a great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Iris Baron

customer_reviews.title: Ill Fitting and Poorly Made Product. Don’t Purchase.
customer_reviews.text: This product is defective. I’ve tried several sizes for my Labrador and it’s the same problem. They don’t come far enough up the leg and they can’t be fastened tight enough. They twist around on her feet and come off. They caused her to take a fall and she can’t afford that as she’s 14. In addition to this, her nail went through the fabric when she was wearing them. I don’t understand all the 5 star reviews. Something is bogus with all of those reviews.
customer_reviews.author: SC Garden Gnome

customer_reviews.title: Great Service, DIdn't Fit
customer_reviews.text: My dog has very long, thin feet (4.5" x 2") so I knew ordering these would not provide a perfect fit, but I ordered a 7 to give them a try. The shoes appeared to be high quality and went on easily. However, they were too short and too loose for her. I contacted the seller who was very responsive and offered to trade them out, but we weren't able to find a size that would work for my dog so they gave a full refund. Greatly appreciated their willingness to work with me!
customer_reviews.author: Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: My dog depends on these
customer_reviews.text: My 12 year old shepherd has bad arthritis in her hips, and these provide the grip she needs to get around the house without slipping and falling. We take them off her at night to let her feet breathe, but otherwise she wears them all day to get around. We get her a new pair ever few months when they wear out. They are a lifesaver!!!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Jean

customer_reviews.title: these shoes are needed for dogs who live in hot climates
customer_reviews.text: my doodle loves them! Before, His poor paws were cracking due to the hot roads and sidewalks. We live in South Florida so this is a must
customer_reviews.author: amazon05188105

customer_reviews.title: Great fit
customer_reviews.text: So I had bought two sizes as I wasn't completely sure on my measuring of my dogs foot...ended up getting the smaller size. They haven't fallen off once. really appreciate the instructions/training method of getting your dog used to the shoes. We didn't follow it exactly as I needed him to be able to wear the shoe immediately (he has a cyst in between his toes that he is on medication for but the salt on the sidewalks keeps irritating it), but the ideas were great. used some of their recommendations and method in order to get Tomato on board. seem durable with the first bit of use.
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Great dog shoes!
customer_reviews.text: I had a similar pair from a different maker so I knew I would like how easily they go on. They are basically the same shoe but lower priced and same quality. However, I went up a size because of the measurements given and they are a little bigger than what I had. I would get the next size down. I bought a 7. My dog wears them twice every weekend at least in the summer. They usually last about 1-2 years but worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Cat

customer_reviews.title: Nice fit, but didn't last long until they wore large holes on bottom
customer_reviews.text: Man, I really wanted to like these! The initial fit was great, but it didn't last. We have an older but active dog that recently moved to a warmer climate and needed some foot protection. Unfortunately, these shoes wore large holes on the bottom, and caused tears in her pads within the first month of purchase. We used them maybe twice a week for playing ball outdoors and the soles of the shoes were trashed.
customer_reviews.author: Sofia

customer_reviews.title: Quality product and customer service
customer_reviews.text: Unlike cloth booties that we've previously purchased, these boots are durable and long-lasting. They can withstand Wisconsin winters while keeping our pup's paws clean and unharmed from the snow, ice, salt, and other chemicals that are present for half the year. Best of all, after losing a single boot on a hike, I cantacted the manufacturer and have never had better customer service. They offered to replace the whole set of boots at no additional cost to me, even suggesting a smaller size so that they don't fall off again. I'm so impressed with the product and the service - I can't recommend these highly enough.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great fit and durability!
customer_reviews.text: I love these dog boots! Thick rubber sole and toe cap with 2 velcro straps keep the boots on if strapped securely. We were in rocky areas and deserts with lots of prickly cactus spines....no problems! Dogs adjusted quickly to wearing the boots...a lot of high stepping at first, which was funny to watch! I ordered a size larger for toe room due to the bulky paws of my AmStaff. So glad I did!! I have purchased boots in the past that didn’t hold up, so I learned what to look for when buying a second pair. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: A K

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: My dog, Lucy, had arthritis problems with her hips. Then she had surgery to remove a tumor from her spine. After surgery, she had no use of her back legs. After physical therapy, she still has issues with walking. Also, when she does walk, she is still dragging her feet some, so her feet need protection. I've tried two or three other products before ordering these little booties. They help my girl a lot with her walking. They stay on and give her a lot more stability.
customer_reviews.author: Vickie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my Chocolate Lab to get through our winter walks without getting salt stuck in his paws (and tracking all that muck into the house). He's 17 months old, 70 pounds. Size 6 fits him perfectly ... I took the advice from other reviews and made sure they were tightly fastened, and didn't have any issues with them falling off. I think these will come in handy during the summer months too, to keep him protected from hot pavement. I gave him some time to get used to them indoors first - it was hilarious the way he was clomping around. By the time we went outside he was navigating the streets and stairs like a pro!
customer_reviews.author: Carrie

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my dog because he has allergies and is always chewing on his feet sometimes to the point if bleeding. I've been trying everything to help with his allergies on his feet and these have been a blessing. At the time I purchased this it was painful for him to walk because his feet were so sore. Once I put these on him he was back to his old self and walking and running just fine. I've had these for a few months now and it was the best decision I made for him. He's also super cute in his little tennis shoes. They've been holding up really well.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Perfect if you have muddy yards!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes!!!! We originally ordered a size 7 which were too big on our 80lb pitbull. I would suggest going a size smaller. The size 6 fit perfectly. The seller was amazing, happy to send us the right size and followed up to make sure they fit. Our backyard has been so muddy so theses shoes have been a saving grace. Now the shoes are muddy, but his feet are clean which cuts down on the licking. We also love the reflective strips. It’s hysterical to track him by the strips and his eyes when he is far out in the yard at night. Highly recommend this product!!!
customer_reviews.author: Heather M

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my doodle on our snowy mountains hikes
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my 56 pound doodle who loves the snow. I was looking for a good pair to put on him when we takes hikes in the mountains during the winter, because as much as he loves snow, the snow and cold eventually will jam up on his paw pads, and it hurts him. When we first put them on, he walked like he was in a marching band, but he quickly got used to them. Don’t be afraid to cinch down the Velcro straps - my dog never complained doing this, and they’ve never come off.
customer_reviews.author: CO momma

customer_reviews.title: Fit great, and didn't take long to get her used to them
customer_reviews.text: Picked these up to prep my dog for the hot summer where the asphalt can burn her paws. My german shepherd is about 70 lbs and they fit perfectly. She didn't want to move initially but after some coaxing, taking them on and off, and going on a long walk, she has no problems wearing and running with them on. The rubber on them seems to be proper shoe rubber, instead of that hard rubbery plastic junk that you usually find on cheap shoes. Great product and I'd definitely buy again whenever these wear out.
customer_reviews.author: Kokorone

customer_reviews.title: So disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I had high hopes for these and was very disappointed. They spin on my dogs feet and made her trip and then they would fall off. No matter how snug you pull the velcro they wouldn't stay on. I mean what are we to do pull them so tight you create a tourniquet ? Ridiculous
customer_reviews.author: jeid

customer_reviews.title: Protection for the paws
customer_reviews.text: So far my dog seems to like them. I gave 5 stars to the comfort, durability, and water resistance only because I think they are good. He hasn't complained so... I found I have to strap the velcro pretty tight for the back ones to stay on, but after that they were fine for tromping through 10" of snow. Hes a 90 lb lab that's full of energy so he was running the whole time too. We got these after he cut his paw one broken glass. We thought we'd try shoes out. He did the funny walk for a few minutes, then didn't seem to mind them at all.
customer_reviews.author: Bran

customer_reviews.title: Fell apart quickly; don't stay on
customer_reviews.text: Disclaimer: my dog runs hard. I bought the booties for playing fetch in the yard in the snow. My dog is aggressive and runs hard. However, we only use them for 10-20 minutes at a time. (a) The booties don't stay on. I have to really crank on the straps, and still at least 2 booties come off each time we fetch. (b) The velcro is shredding. Thread from the velcro (from the stitches holding it in place and the base of the velcro fabric itself) is coming off. Each booty has 10 loose threads after 6 uses.
customer_reviews.author: Mel P

customer_reviews.title: Love them and so does my son ziggy! 🐕
customer_reviews.text: I have a toy size Aussie that weights 14lb, I had recently bought him these doggy shoes at size 2. These shoes fit him perfectly! I absolutely love them and so does he. These are perfect for Texas weather as the concrete can get extremely hot. Now I take him on walks everyday and not have to worry about his little paws getting burned from the heat. It also works extremely well during the rainy season and is indeed waterproof. I definitely recommend these shoes for your furry babies.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan H

customer_reviews.title: Solid bootie with nice treads on the bottom
customer_reviews.text: The booties are more sturdy than I thought they would be. They have a semi-hard sole bottom with traction imprints on it, which helps my dog move around and allows her to run without restriction. She runs as though there is nothing different! The bootie's fit nice and I love the reflective velcro band at the top and are pretty light weight. The size choices are good and it was pretty easy to determine which size to buy. The only thing I would change would be to have them come up the leg a little bit higher. Other than that, these are a great fit at a great price and I would not hesitate to purchase them again.
customer_reviews.author: Diane C.

customer_reviews.title: Great to reduce the winter mess inside, easy on/off for my pup, he loves running in snow!
customer_reviews.text: These weyeasy enough to get on my WillieG and he really didn't mind them, once he figured out he could run in them, he loves the snow and this reduces alot of what he'd drag inside. I look forward to summer walks, with the reflective strips. The only set back, he happens to have a toe deform, and I have to set that boot just right to not come off. Really a good product for big dog feet!!!
customer_reviews.author: Ditch

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: Love these boots for the Minnesota winter months for my two dogs. My larger dog has furry paws so she gets ice between her toes and this really helps to prevent that. I also wanted to protect my pup's feet from the salt on the roads during walks. They are not a fan when I first put them on, but once we are outside they don't care. I love how these have two straps, they only occasionally fall off. I also really like how they are reflective because it helps to ensure they are still on during our night time walks and find them if they do fall off. So far these are the best boots I have tried.
customer_reviews.author: hmarie5489

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for rainy days
customer_reviews.text: I mean, my Standard Poodle is by no means happy to wear these shoes, but she still lets me put them on her and she keeps them on. I think she knows it’s for her own good, lol. Comfort wise I don’t think she’s too comfortable in them because she lets me put almost anything on her, but she tries to hide as soon as these shoes come out. They do, however, go on easily and stay on her when she’s running around. I don’t let her out in the rain without these shoes on. For reference she is 45lbs and a size 6 fit her skinny legs perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Genie G

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product for dogs.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product, Well made, look great and made EXTREAMLY WELL! Only took my Bouvier Tia 5 minutes to learn to walk with. The two video's our when she first put them on & other 5 minutes later.she's nine years old and we have hardwood floors in the house but she has a hard time walking on, she walks on them now like a champ.
customer_reviews.author: termitedog

customer_reviews.title: They work and are worth then money!
customer_reviews.text: I start off saying that we haven't had too many chances to use them just yet so not sure on the how they hold up long term but they do work and fit well. I followed the instructions on measuring his feet. At first he walked funny but within 10 minutes he was running around with them like they were not even there. I threw a ball for him about 4 different times, he ran full force to get the ball, and the shoes stayed on the whole time. They are half the price as the big named ones. I'll probably buy another set for my other Aussie.
customer_reviews.author: Caverman

customer_reviews.title: Unsure Dog
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to protect my dogs paws during our never-ending summers in Nevada. She has worn latex booties before and seemed to do okay in them so I upgraded to these. There is a thick sole so they are proving difficult to get her used to them. They come with a little instruction packet to teach you how to acclimate your dog to them. It's helpful. I think these shoes will be great once I can get her to walk rather than bite them off.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Don’t stay on, save your money.
customer_reviews.text: Have a 60lb pit mix and these did not stay on. They’d fall off after a few minutes. If you have a high energy dog, try the rubber boots such as Pawz, those are more secure.
customer_reviews.author: muteya mapfumo

customer_reviews.title: Front shoes fell off.
customer_reviews.text: I gave a couple stars for the material. Really good quality and true to size based on the reviews I've seen for large dogs. The issue for us became the shoes staying on. No matter how tight we secured the straps, or how well our dog behaved with them on, the front 2 would fall off before we made it out the front door. Not sure if it's just our dogs paw shape or what, but it was a let down.
customer_reviews.author: Elena Arias

customer_reviews.title: At long last, boots that stay on!
customer_reviews.text: Love these boots! We take our dog hiking in snow and dirt a lot and have never found boots that stay on. We snowshoed up the mountain today in deep powder snow and never did any one of these adorable boots fall off! My dog was so happy running around in the snow and I have to guess they were comfortable on him as he never complained or tried to yank them off. These boots are so well designed, allow regular walking motion, and they kept his paws totally dry after 3+ hours in deep snow. No more licking his paws till they bleed. Highly recommend these boots.
customer_reviews.author: Jiasong

customer_reviews.title: Does not stay secure on doggy feet
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for my older dog, who has a hard time getting up and down on our tile floors because her paws slip. If the boots stayed in place consistently, they would be a good purchase. However, the tend to rotate around their paws or otherwise slip halfway off, in both cases resulting in our dog (a lab) walking very awkwardly with them and causing even less mobility. Other dog booties/shoes that did not have a rubber sole happened to say on their feet much better, even though it might not have been as slip resistant.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Chapa

customer_reviews.title: Great product and amazing company
customer_reviews.text: The first pair we received were used with dog hair all over it so I didn't put a very good review. The shipping was an error on Amazon's side but the company reached out to me and sent us a brand new pair plus a free AMAZING dog leash for the hassle. We had tried two other dog boots from a local store and returned immediately. The QUMY are great! The first time putting them on they stayed on and he ran all over. We've taken him hiking and they didn't bother him. It was nice getting home and not have to clean his paws from sticker weeds. He's a two year old border collie.
customer_reviews.author: Hill

customer_reviews.title: Wish I had known about these boots earlier!
customer_reviews.text: Video is of the day we got them and put them on. The boots went on easily and with the velcro they stayed on the entire walk. He wasn't so sure about them at first and walked like a marching horse. Once he got outside he was fine. My husband said he didn't mind the boots and walked like he didn't know he had them on. I think our dog appreciated them too because it was only 7 above with lots of snow and ice. He's a Golden Retriever male and weighs around 77lbs.
customer_reviews.author: Claudia Schuman

customer_reviews.title: Great dog shoes
customer_reviews.text: My dog seems to like these... We have a border collie that runs around my pool constantly in the summer time so we bought them to protect his feet. He is a little neurotic and wore a hole in them within the first few hours...But this company went over and above and made sure that we had a replacement and another little gift for our dog that we absolutely love!! I haven't seen this level customer service ever with any company, well done. Highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Gardner

customer_reviews.title: not very durable
customer_reviews.text: I take my dog for a run every morning. I purchased these booties to protect his paws from abrasion and keep them clean. They accomplished both goals, but with some caveats. While he had no problem adapting to them, they are hard to keep on his paws. One or more will fall off when he runs full speed. All 4 are the same size, so when you purchase the correct size for front paws, they are too big for the rear. Consequently, the rear booties twist around backwards until the rubber sole is on top of his foot. Durability is a problem. Inside of two weeks, all 4 were full of holes and shot.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Shaffer

customer_reviews.title: Wrong Size
customer_reviews.text: We bought the size 7 (Width 2.76) boots for our 70 lbs GSD with his width of 2.75, but they were too big. We like the soles and boots overall, but they don't stay in. Especially, their back feet are smaller width-wise and longer length-wise. We are waiting for another set from a different company. We wish there were two different sizes for front and back feet. For large dogs, ones for back feet should be longer, too. He seems uncomfortable when sitting as the boots slide forward all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Maya

customer_reviews.title: Dog loves her Qumy Boots
customer_reviews.text: We tried several dog boots at various local pet shops and all were quickly removed by our dog (a very loving, playful, energetic athletic American Pitbull Terrier). We found QUMY and ordered a pair. They arrived quickly and are exactly as described and a superior product to what is offered in the pet shops. Our dog was not able to shake these off her feet and after the first 5 minutes of uncertainty walking in boots she was found running and leaping in them. We believe she actually enjoys having these on her feet when walking on the hot pavement (and that pavement get very very hot in the Southern United States).
customer_reviews.author: Charles R. Hoffman

customer_reviews.title: Kiddos APPROVED
customer_reviews.text: HOY APPROVED!!! after going through 3 sizes. We have a solid secured fit. I went with QUMY after researching for the best all around protection. The rubber soles with the heavy duty stitching, and wrap around velco. My kids love the water, either the ocean or lakes. Even hiking, these boots are well worth the cost. She always 100‰ gets cuts from sea shells, rocks, even hot pavement. We will never leave the house without them. If I wear shoes, my kiddos will too.
customer_reviews.author: WILL

customer_reviews.title: EASILY ON & STAYS ON!
customer_reviews.text: After 6 sets of boots I finally found the perfect ones for my 50 lb. pitbull/beagle. I followed the foot measuring instructions & for her 3" foot I bought her a size 6 & they're perfect. Putting them on is a breeze because the opening is wide and funnel-shaped for fast and easy access. The lower strap folds the funnel over and locks the boot in place while the upper strap is just added security. She's a bit clumsy in them on her first trip outside but she's getting used to them. But the best part is that she leaves the house with four boots on and actually returns inside with four boots on! Great product!
customer_reviews.author: muffy223

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: I love these! And surprisingly, so does my dog. I bought these for my 12 year old lab because she kept slipping on the floors. She now waits for me to put them on her in the morning and loves wearing them. No more slipping! The soles of the shoes have great traction. And the Velcro straps keep them from falling off the dog’s feet. Once this wear out, I’ll definitely be buying another pair!
customer_reviews.author: L Kiser

customer_reviews.title: Helps stabilize feet from sliding outwards in German Shepherd
customer_reviews.text: Item is very well made and it was no problem for my 95lb German Shepherd to walk in them right away. I purchased these boots to help my girl to walk better because she has developed a little hip weakness and these prevent her feet from slipping when she walks on our tile floor. The rubber sole grips very well. I use them on her back paws only while indoors and then on all 4 paws outdoors. I am very pleased with the results and so is she! Excellent product that I will definitely will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: LAFD Princess

customer_reviews.title: We love them!
customer_reviews.text: We've tried 4 other brands, these are the best! Easy to put on and the 2 velcro bands keep them on. Size 5 fit our 35# cocker perfect. We've gone over twenty miles now on upstate N.Y. snow, ice and plowed roads without a problem and haven't had a boot come off. The heavy-duty treads give me confidence that I'm protecting my guy's paws. I put them on a little boot rack by a furnace vent when we come in and they look good as new and ready to go the next day.
customer_reviews.author: Spanielman

customer_reviews.title: Great for rainy weather!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my dog because we have carpet and it’s hard to fully clean his paws after he goes outside to potty. He’s an indoor dog so getting these boots helps, we should’ve bought them a long time ago. So far they protect his feet from getting wet. They fit as expected after I measured his feet. You just have to strap them on tight to ensure they don’t come off. My dog didn’t want to walk the first time he put them on but he got used to them.
customer_reviews.author: Lowell E.

customer_reviews.title: Yay for paw protection!
customer_reviews.text: These are working really well on my dog. Once she got over the "oh there is something on my feet" awkwardness she now takes on her snowy/icy walks like a pro! My one issue with them is sometimes I don't tighten them enough so they spin around on her foot. Also, the position of the top of the boot/straps can be a little tricky with her dewclaw - thus them being a little too loose on occasion. Overall, grateful for these boots and the protection and traction they offer my dog in the winter.
customer_reviews.author: Katharine Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Dog booties
customer_reviews.text: These are great and the best dog boots I’ve used so far. If you could make them go a little higher so the Velcro is above the dogs dew claw that would be better. One thing to be careful is that if your dog has a dew claw and the Velcro goes over it then the dew claw rubs against their fur. This causes basically a burn from the friction.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Chang

customer_reviews.title: Great product.  Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.text: My pooch has no problem with these. He chewed off his paw pad due to yeast, so I bandage it and then put on the boots. He can still run and play as it’s healing since he has so much energy. W/o the boots he’d likely be far more confined during his healing process. They open up wide to slip on easily and have a thick rubber bottom so nothing pokes through them. The feet are well protected. It took only two days for him to get used to them. He needs only one foot covered but I noticed that he does better if he’s even on all four feet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Get the job done
customer_reviews.text: Very lightweight and relatively easy to get on. I like that they have the paw print on the outside seam to make it easier to figure which shoes go to which foot. They all seem to be the same shape though so not too sure it makes much difference. Decent buy for the price but you’ll definitely need a liner/sock and to keep a good eye on your dog to make sure you don’t lose a shoe while out.
customer_reviews.author: Davis

customer_reviews.title: He walked a little funny at first but got used to them
customer_reviews.text: My dog didn't mind us putting the shoes on him. He walked a little funny at first but got used to them. They seem durable and look cute.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Doi

customer_reviews.title: Very good doggie boots
customer_reviews.text: Our QUMY Dog boots are just as described. They have a nice rubber sole and 2 velcro straps for adjusting to the perfect fit. The size for Large Dogs fits our English Springer Spaniel perfectly. We (pretty much) followed the directions to introduce our dog to the boots and she has accepted them just fine. Lots of treats. We had to find something that our dog could wear when we go camping in the mountains with pine needles, sap, rock, stickers, etc. Every time we camp she would puncture a paw pad and bleed. We would end up having to clean and wrap her paw for the entire trip. These boots will be very helpful!
customer_reviews.author: Darlene

customer_reviews.title: Good for city dogs. Definitely not trail ready!
customer_reviews.text: Debated between these and boots from ruffwear. Settled on these based on price after hearing stories of lost boots, and not knowing how my dog would react. First impressions were high - they seemed to have decent construction and my dog had no problems wearing them. She wears them only in deep snow as her fur gets packed with snow. Fast forward a month, and the quality is starting to show. All four boots are tearing, and the secondary straps have fallen apart. My dog doesn't sit still long enough to chew on them; the wear all seems to be from runs through hard snow. Luckily winter is almost over; I'll replace with the name brand next year!
customer_reviews.author: Steve W.

customer_reviews.title: Great and hold on quite well.
customer_reviews.text: These work exactly how I’d like them to. My 18 month border collie had a cut on his foot that I didn’t want dirt getting into so I bought these so he could still go outside and run a little. They did the trick. I can’t tell whether they’re a 6 or 9 due to no line showing up or down but they’re either or and he’s only 18 months. The only complaint is when he cuts back and forth really hard they twist a little and agitate his little weird doggie thumb
customer_reviews.author: Brendanfg21

customer_reviews.title: Very well built shoe
customer_reviews.text: We purchased these for our senior dog. She was burning through paw pads by another company to great expense. We decided to give these boots a try. The construction on them is very well made. The tread on the boot is very durable. It was a bit difficult for our pup to walk in them and will require more time. Be sure to measure your dogs foot to make sure you have a good fit.
customer_reviews.author: Annie

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT for my Aussie!!
customer_reviews.text: We hike every weekend and I got these shoes to keep my pup's feet safe and also to keep the inside of my car clean. He loves them and so do we!! We ordered a size 6 for our full size Australian Shepard and they fit great. I'm ordering another pair because he finally wore a hole in one shoe after 6 months of regular use. I can't tell you how many compliments he gets when he wears them and he just beams at the attention.
customer_reviews.author: Abbey Dalla

customer_reviews.title: A-1 service
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately these boots did not fit the needs of our ten yr old boxer with bad arthritis, as her leg structure has diminished, making a proper fit unattainable. But, I must commend this company for making several attempts to 'make it right' . They were under no obligation, but displayed a generous and caring attitude in doing so. I remain very grateful for their efforts.
customer_reviews.author: gskat

customer_reviews.title: Constantly turning on back paws.
customer_reviews.text: Ive had these booties for my dog for a little over a year now and they worked great to help her gain traction again as she is up there in age. The worked great for a while, but now i have constant issues with the back booties spinning/turning around on her foot to where the rubber is on the top rather than the bottom. I use socks with them and tighten them all the way, but still this happens. Its frustrating as i thought I have found a long term solution for her aging body, but now i seem to be back in the market for booties again that wont spin on her foot despite being tightened all the way
customer_reviews.author: Sirissa

customer_reviews.title: Durable Shoes for the Arizona Mountains
customer_reviews.text: I bought a size 5 for my english bull terrier and a size 7 for my lab/bloodhound mix pups. I picked these shoes based off their soles and their durability since we need shoes for hiking. They definitely delivered. The sizing for the both are pretty accurate however I could've gone smaller with my english bull terrier. I chose the size of the shoes by weight. The shoes stayed on throughout the duration of the hike even with running involved. The dogs got many compliments on them and appeared to be comfortable once they got used to them. I'm pretty happy with these shoes and would highly recommend choosing this pair over others.
customer_reviews.author: CMC

customer_reviews.title: They do come off pretty easily and I'm always afraid because you have to ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought for our 14 year old dog who struggles to keep her feet underneath her on tile and laminate flooring. They do come off pretty easily and I'm always afraid because you have to pull the velcro so tight to keep them on, but they definitely help her stand up and walk easier. If they could have been a few inches taller on her legs, it would have been so much better, I think.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Grace

customer_reviews.title: Great for running in the woods -
customer_reviews.text: Bought these as a replacement for lost boots - our dog is a 100lb chocolate lab who gets to run through the woods a couple times a day. He lost 3 of the 4 we purchased last year. When I saw this style had a reflective strap, I decided to try it and hoped they might be easier to find if any came off on his walk. I measured his paw and went with a size 8 - they fit great. You do have to tighten up the straps but they have stayed on during his "walks" in the woods - very happy. Fast shipping and great packaging. Would reccomment both the product and the vendor. Thanks !
customer_reviews.author: OHReview

customer_reviews.title: Dog boot dress up
customer_reviews.text: I am much more impressed with the dog boots than is my 90 pound German Shepard mix. She has adapted to them reasonably well and does not fight when the boots are being put on her paws. She initially does a high step marching walk at first. When she relaxes she can run around inside and outside little difficulty. Visiting family this summer that have nice hardwood floors, the dog boots will prevent her from marking up the floor finish. They should also be useful when hiking should we encounter an area of sand burrs or hot rocks.
customer_reviews.author: Noslorich

customer_reviews.title: Not for athletic dogs
customer_reviews.text: I have an athletic 1 year old lab who cut his foot. I wanted a protective boot that he could wear x-country skiing while his foot fully healed. The dog boots looked well made but fit a bit loose even though I followed the sizing recommendations. I tightened the Velcro straps as much as I could but out on the trail, the boot fell off and was lost within the first half mile. They might be good for a dog on a leash but seem unsuitable for an athletic dog running free.
customer_reviews.author: rebelstreet72

customer_reviews.title: Great boots, bought a size up
customer_reviews.text: So far so good with these boots! We have a McNab collie and these boots fit his unique cat-like feet very well. I bought a size up from the recommendation due to the toe spread he has when making fast stops. These fit underneath his dew pad and so far there isn't any chafing. He has worn them twice so far and as long as we tighten the Velcro all the way, they stay on his feet no matter how fast he is sprinting chasing balls in the backyard on the snow.
customer_reviews.author: Claire Turney

customer_reviews.title: BEST DOG SHOES
customer_reviews.text: I have a 52 Lb lab, I've tried multiple different brands of dogs shoes that didn't stay on or she was uncomfortable in, but these are fantastic, I've used them for OVER A YEAR now throughout all four seasons in snow, ice, water, mud, pavement, they've taken quite the beating but still look brand new! Highly recommended, especially since they have reflective strips around them
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Decent quality. Slightly to big. Dog hates them.
customer_reviews.text: My wife wanted these, as our dog had some hind leg problems for a while. We have hardwood floors and the wife thought it would keep our dog's legs from slipping. It sounded good but our dog hates them. Might be something a dog could benefit from on a walk, but for our purposes it just didn't work. They were a little on the large size for our dog. She got them off after about a minute of trying no matter how we secured them.
customer_reviews.author: Julian

customer_reviews.title: Fits my black labs paws well!!
customer_reviews.text: My lab and I run together. My lab wears these well. As the video shows, he needed to transition into them the first couple times but adapted well. He does love to run! When you put the shoes on the paws, the 2 velcro straps help keep them in place. We have ran 20+ miles already and they hold up as expected and have not fallen off! Follow the instructions to find your canine's size and order!!
customer_reviews.author: Ira

customer_reviews.title: Best shoes yet!!
customer_reviews.text: My dog has been wearing shoes for about 5 years living in downtown LA to protect his feet, now he needs them more for his arthritis since he doesn't have much of a callus. I wanted something that had more of a "real" shoe bottom for this and THESE ARE IT!! I am so happy with these shoes, easy on and off, they stay on well, immediately upon delivery I tossed them in the wash and hung them to dry and they did amazing. We will definitely be purchasing a few other colors for him! Btw he's 94lbs and wearing an 8!
customer_reviews.author: MsCake

customer_reviews.title: Worth every dollar spent
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing for my old man of 13 years old. Noticed he was slipping on our hardwood floors. Bought so many different things like grip spray, those stick on pads, and the cheaper socks that have grip pads. Nothing lasted. The spray wouldn’t last for but a few hours cause the hair on the floor. The sticky pads would come off. The socks would turn or come off. These are designed perfectly so kudos to the manufacturer! Buy em
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: My lab loves her shoes!!!
customer_reviews.text: My lab Molly loves her shoes!! She loves to go on walks but she has super sensitive feet and we live on a gravel road which makes it very difficult for her to walk on. She walked a little funny when I first put the shoes on her but it didn't take long for her to figure out that her feet no longer hurt when we go on walks! Just strap them on fairly tight and they don't fall off! She even runs in them! She comes right up to me when she sees me get her shoes out because she knows we are about to go on a walk or run!
customer_reviews.author: Amy F.

customer_reviews.title: Great boots, even though my pup is not a fan.
customer_reviews.text: She seemed like she was adjusting to them fairly well. I gradually kept them on her a little longer each time to get her used to them, then I took my eyes off her for maybe 5 minutes, and she chewed partially through the reflective strap on the boots I had on her front paws. I was able to sew one of the straps completely back together, but she took a small chunk out of the other. Still experimenting with how to fix that strap. But they still function, so her paws can be protected when I’m in areas with hot pavement.
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: Protect Pup’s Paws
customer_reviews.text: After looking online everywhere for dog boots to help my pup with a paw injury, I purchased these. They are very easy to get on and the double Velcro straps keep them secure. The rubber bottoms give him traction and protect better than boots without that added layer. Great product and a true fit.
customer_reviews.author: denise p.

product_meta.title: QUMY Dog Boots Waterproof Shoes for Dogs with Reflective Strip Rugged Anti-Slip Sole Black 4PCS
product_meta.description:
Size:size 7: 3.1"x2.7"(L*W)| Color:BlackCONVENIENT: Water resistant dog boots keeps paws dry and warm. No more wiping muddy or sandy paws after the rain or snow.
NON-SLIP and WATERPROOF: Molded rubber bottom, the dog shoes are made with water resistant material.
SECURE: Easy to put on / off. These dog shoes expands with a wide split seam opening and two adjustable and reflective straps to ensure a tight fit, also make your dog safe at night.
RUGGED: Tough anti-slip sole of dog shoes provides stability and traction, protection from sharp thorns and hot pavement.

Description:
This set of flexible dog boots will act as a good partner for them, protecting the paws against hurt from sidewalks, asphalt, grass etc.
The sole of the waterproof durable dog shoes is sturdy, flexible, skid-resistant and allows the dog boots to be used indoors or outdoors, in wet and dry, hot and cold conditions.
These dog shoes are sturdy enough to withstand outside play, and protect your dog's paws from stones, dirt and mud.
Wide split seam top opening which makes very easy and quick to put on the dog boots.

For Cleaning, the dog shoes are hand washable and dried naturally in the air.

Please follow these easy measuring instructions to ensure that these dog boots are comfortable fit for your dog.
1,Place the paw on a piece of paper and press down on the top, mimicking how the paw spreads when the dog is walking.
2,Mark the left and right sides on the paper and measure the distance between the marks.
3,The width of the paw should be smaller than the dog shoes size chart.

Package inludes:
One set dog boots - 4PCS
feature_bullets: Size 5: 2.7"x2.2"(L*W) for 40-55 lbs; size 6: 2.9"x2.5"(L*W) for 52-65 lbs; size 7: 3.1"x2.7"(L*W) for 63-75 lbs; size 8: 3.3"x2.9"(L*W) for 74-88 lbs). The number of boot soles stands for the size of the shoe, is not used to distinguish the left foot or the right foot, such as "7" stands for the size 7, instead of representing the left feet.
SECURE and ADJUSTABLE: Easy to put on / off. These dog shoes expands with a wide split seam opening and two adjustable and reflective straps to ensure a tight fit, also make your dog safe at night.
RUGGED: Tough anti-slip sole of dog boots provides stability and traction, protection from sharp thorns and hot pavement.
QUALITY: The dog boots have a rugged sole and high quality fabrics that are then sewn together to ensure they are ready for your adventure.
FASHIONABLE: QUMY dog boots are with cute pet paw embroidery, paws side is the outside, soft and hand washable.

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
